description: ANTLRWorks 2 is a complete rewrite of the previous grammar tool using several new techniques developed at Tunnel Vision Labs. The core framework we use for NetBeans® development was originally created for this project, but easily extends to other languages and is the starting point for all of our NetBeans-based applications.
